turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I placed an order last week, order number 12345, and it still hasn't shipped. What's going on?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you're inquiring about order 12345. Let me check on that for you. One moment please...

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thanks. I'm starting to get a little worried because it was supposed to arrive by today.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I've reviewed the order. It appears there was a slight delay at our distribution center due to an unexpected staffing shortage. It is now scheduled to ship out tomorrow and should arrive within 2-3 business days after that. I apologize for the inconvenience.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: A staffing shortage? Seriously? Is there anything you can do to expedite it? I needed this item for a special event this weekend!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. While I can't guarantee anything, I've added a note to the order requesting expedited shipping once it leaves the warehouse. You'll receive a tracking number as soon as it ships. As a gesture of apology, I've also applied a 10% discount to your next order. Would you like to know more about return policies?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: A discount is nice, I guess. But honestly, what are the chances it will *actually* arrive before the weekend? If it's unlikely, I'd rather just cancel the order now. It's a pretty specialized item, so I can't just pick it up at any local store.
